title: @Riot Is marksman update...
body: Is it primarily item work or is there a fair amount t of champ and/or mechanics work involved?

replies.body: Reasonable amount of both item and kit updates. We should be ready to start talking details in around a couple of weeks.

Kit updates.... Please tell me you're not screwing with Draven's mechanical niche.

Having to redo my muscle memory for him quite frankly isn't something I might even be capable of without at least 100+ games which is a fraction of the total amount of matches I have with him.
I hope you understand why a lot of us are apprehensive about this considering how well the juggernaut patch went over.

The irony is a lot of the problems with the Juggernauts were caused by the community.

The highlight of the argument is that Skarner was considered waaaayyyyyy too weak by PBE testers, which turned into tuning them up immediately before live release, which turned into the catastrophe that was release Skarner.

Exactly, i don't know why people are downvoting this when it's exactly what happend
